Action.author: binhn
Action.body: We could make CouchDB the first plugin and run all the existing tests against it. If all pass, a good sign. Or the other way around if we think CouchDB should be the default. I don't really have an opinion 1 way or the other, just that we shouldn't have 2 DBs in the base code.

Action.author: binhn
Action.body: I am also interested in revisiting RockDB as Facebook has changed the license to Apache v2 https://github.com/facebook/rocksdb/blob/master/LICENSE.Apache

Action.author: senthil1
Action.body: ~binhn Most solutions are already using CouchDB as the StateDB. Hence, i am not sure whether it is good to make it as a plugin now. We anyway need a simple embedded KV store (irrespective of the stateDB) to keep metadata info (like purge entries, history index etc...).
